News.headline: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Wealdstone
News.page_title: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Wealdstone
News.URL_keywords: Match Officials: Dagenham and Redbridge v Wealdstone
News.short_description: Saturday's referee for the Daggers’ Emirates FA Cup home game against Wealdstone has been named as Adrian Quelch
News.description:
The two assistants have been named as Mark Lucie and Lewis Sandoe with the fourth official being Paul Yates

Ticket information for the game can be found here.
